meanings.definition: A horizontal support across the top of a door or window.
meanings.sent1: The lintel above the door kept the structure stable.
meanings.sent2: She painted the lintel of the window a bright blue color.
meanings.sent3: The lintel above the door seemed to be smiling at the visitors.
meanings.sent4: The lintel stood strong like a guardian over the entrance.
meanings.sent5: The ancient lintel bore the weight of history in its sturdy frame.

meanings.definition: A beam used to support the weight of a wall above an opening.
meanings.sent1: The builders carefully placed the lintel to hold up the wall.
meanings.sent2: The lintel cracked under the pressure of the heavy wall above.
meanings.sent3: The lintel above the doorway told jokes to the bricks below.
meanings.sent4: The lintel carried the burden of the wall with unwavering strength.
meanings.sent5: The lintel groaned under the weight but never gave way.
